TextBody:
Hi Joel,

Please let me know if you had a chance to look over the previous emails.

Instead of @mortonbank.com, @mimecast.com, etc. include the version without the "@".
So mortonbank.com, mimecast.com, etc.
Also, leave FYDIBOHF25SPDLT there.
This should solve the issue.

Please let me know if this resolves the issue.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

Subject: RE: Netwrix Support Ticket #433235 - email domain not being bypassed by CAP policy [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0Kx3j9:ref ]

Hi Joel,

We have received an update from our colleagues on this.

Instead of @mortonbank.com, @mimecast.com, etc. include the version without the "@".
So mortonbank.com, mimecast.com, etc.
Also, leave FYDIBOHF25SPDLT there.
This should solve the issue.

Please let me know if this resolves the issue.

Best Regards,
